name: Shinobi Moto
description:
Shinobi Moto is an endless runner inspired by retro classics like "Ninja Gaiden" and 80's action movies! Destroy enemies and collect orbs in a fast paced action environment to gain points and achieve the highest score!  

With the exception of a few sound effects found at freesound.org. ...
All assets, Art and Music, including the hit single "Greatest Fighter," were created by Big Hitter Games and Tristan Blue.
Programming and Design by Darren Buckley. 

Notes: This project was made for the Three Button ( 8 Bits to Infinity ) Game Jam. We apologize for any bugs or errors. At the moment our pause function does not work and we have much to polish. We will have some awesome updates in the future, as we have many other ideas for this project!  Thanks for playing!
